data.text: @Hold2LLC You seem to care an awful lot about what other people do while complaining that people care an awful lot about what you do, to be fair!
@Hold2LLC I look forward to this becoming an anti-CRT twitter account once nobody cares to hear you repeat yourself about non existent COVID restrictions.

@Hold2LLC Same findings from decade prior as well. 

Obviously these are hospitalization numbers, but - pretty sure you can agree there's a likely relationship between hospitalizations and deaths as it relates here. https://t.co/oebkuREvaM

@Hold2LLC Just wanted to verify! 

Now of course - as we know, these numbers are obviously not reliable, and we need to take a look further into "WITH" vs "BECAUSE". https://t.co/EEyxpmG9Rl
@PhDHaver Obviously, yes. Why did you ask when you see my name?
